descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
# Team up with your inner monster to explore a 100% hand-painted dreamlike world. #

My Monsters is an immersive VR action-adventure set in Onirium. Join Moti, your inner monster, to journey through surreal landscapes, solve puzzles, fight foes, and uncover an emotional story about anxiety, fear, and loneliness.

**⚔️Face Your Enemies, Unleash Moti’s Power**

Engage in dynamic VR combat: unlock combos, dodges, and ranged attacks to overcome enemies.

[media]

**🤝Team Up with Your Inner Monster**

Moti is more than a companion. He’s part of you. Solve puzzles and clear paths together.

[media]

**🌙A Meaningful Dreamlike Tale**

Explore Onirium, shaped by dreams and nightmares, confronting humanity’s inner monsters. 

[media]

**🎨Unique Art Style – 100% Hand-Painted VR**

Every inch of Onirium is hand-painted, creating a living dream with stunning landscapes.

[media]

**💥Keep Your Monster Safe**

Help Moti through struggles, or risk losing control when fear takes over. 

[media]

**🔹 Key Features**
- Story-driven fairy-tale with interactive storytelling.
- 70 handcrafted maps across 3 biomes.
- Self-coop gameplay.
- 10 enemy types and bosses inspired by mental disorders.

We are a small passionate team. We hope you enjoy playing our game as much as we loved making it.

My Monsters was supported by the Lei Paulo Gustavo (2023), through the Governo do Estado de São Paulo and the Secretaria da Cultura, Economia e Indústria Criativas.

And you... **What Are Your Monsters?**

[media]
